import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './stylesheet.css'; import './reset.css'; const api = { key:"7248eff058ba1f79c53e30c2ba0fac6e", base:"https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/" } function App() { const [query, setQuery] = useState(''); const [coord, setCoord] = useState(''); const [weatherInfo, setWeatherInfo] = useState(''); const FetchLonLat = evt => { if (evt.key === "Enter") { fetch(`${api.base}weather?q=${query}&cnt=1&appid=${api.key}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { setCoord(result); setQuery(''); console.log(result); fetchWeatherInfo(result); }); } } function fetchWeatherInfo(result) { console.log(result.coord.lat); } const inputHandler = (event) => { setQuery(event.target.value) } return (
{(typeof coord.main != "undefined") ? (

{coord.coord.lat}, {coord.coord.lon}
